name: Chrono Echo
description: We must never take our lives for granted, lest we forget that each moment in time is sacred.
effect: Followers of Dialga may call upon 'Chrono Echo' once per quest as a bonus action during their combat turn, allowing them to perform a free reroll on an accuracy or damage roll. This reroll does not affect Will, and the player may roll again using their Will if they wish to do so. Gains additional uses equal to rank bonus.
